trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: Representa una cola del flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Workflow queues are used to pass messages between a host or host services and activities in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Las colas de flujo de trabajo se utilizan para pasar los mensajes entre un host o servicios de host y actividades en un flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Any activity can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> by calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and a host, a service, or another activity can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Enqueue%2A> to add an item to that <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier actividad puede crear un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> llamando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>y un host, un servicio u otra actividad pueden llamar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Enqueue%2A> para agregar un elemento a ese <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.

trans-unit.source: You can subscribe to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> event to be notified when an item arrives on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Puede suscribir al evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> que se notificará cuando un elemento llegue a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Peek%2A> to examine an item at the beginning of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> to remove an item from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Puede utilizar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Peek%2A> para examinar al principio un elemento de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> y <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> para quitar un elemento de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> that you can use to perform other management operations on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>, such as deleting the queue.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> se asocia a una clase <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> que usted puede utilizar para realizar otras operaciones de administración en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>, como eliminar la cola.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueuingService%2A> exposes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> associated with this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueuingService%2A> expone la clase <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> asociada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente código de ejemplo se muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> llamando al método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> property to determine whether any messages exist in the current queue.
trans-unit.target: También utiliza la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> para determinar si los mensajes existen en la cola actual.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> method to remove and return the first object in the queue.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, el código utiliza el método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> para quitar y devolver el primer objeto en la cola.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de la muestra de SDK de actividad de observador de archivo del archivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [actividad del Monitor de sistema de archivos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items contained in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el número de elementos contenidos en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: El número de elementos en la cola de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente código de ejemplo se muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> llamando al método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> property to determine whether any messages exist in the current queue.
trans-unit.target: También utiliza la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> para determinar si los mensajes existen en la cola actual.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> method to remove and return the first object in the queue.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, el código utiliza el método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> para quitar y devolver el primer objeto en la cola.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de la muestra de SDK de actividad de observador de archivo del archivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [actividad del Monitor de sistema de archivos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the object at the beginning of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Quita y devuelve el objeto al comienzo de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The object that is removed from the beginning of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que se quita del principio de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: You can check <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is empty before you call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A>, or you can catch the <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Puede comprobar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> para determinar si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> está vacío antes de llamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A>, o puede detectar <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente código de ejemplo se muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> llamando al método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> property to determine whether any messages exist in the current queue.
trans-unit.target: También utiliza la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> para determinar si los mensajes existen en la cola actual.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> method to remove and return the first object in the queue.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, el código utiliza el método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> para quitar y devolver el primer objeto en la cola.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de la muestra de SDK de actividad de observador de archivo del archivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [actividad del Monitor de sistema de archivos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: La colección <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> está vacía.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que especifica si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> está habilitado; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que se va a agregar a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto al final de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> no está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object at the beginning of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto al principio de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> sin eliminarlo.

trans-unit.source: The object at the beginning of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto situado al principio de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A> method, but <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Peek%2A> does not modify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método es similar al método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A>, pero <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Peek%2A> no modifica la colección <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.

trans-unit.source: You can check <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is empty before you call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A>, or you can catch the <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Puede comprobar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Count%2A> para determinar si <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> está vacío antes de llamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.Dequeue%2A>, o puede detectar <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: La colección <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> está vacía.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is delivered on this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando un elemento se entrega en este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is only used for processing that must occur synchronously with event delivery to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Este evento sólo se utiliza para procesamiento, que se debe producir sincrónicamente con la entrega del evento a la instancia de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The event handler may execute on a non-workflow thread so access to any shared workflow object, for example, any <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject>, must be protected.
trans-unit.target: El controlador de eventos se puede ejecutar en un subproceso sin flujo de trabajo. Por lo tanto, se debe proteger el acceso a cualquier objeto de flujo de trabajo compartido, por ejemplo, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is available on this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando un elemento está disponible en este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> event is raised in an asynchronous manner.
trans-unit.target: El evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> se provoca de una manera asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: The sender for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> event will be the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext> of the subscribing <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: El remitente para el evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> será <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext> del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> de suscripción.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre de la cola del flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue is set by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> establece el nombre de la cola del flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the queuing service associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los servicios de cola asociados con <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" /> that represents the queuing service associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" /> que representa el servicio de cola asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: A subscriber for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un suscriptor para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers a subscriber to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemArrived" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Registra un suscriptor en el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemArrived" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers a subscriber to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Registra un suscriptor en el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.RegisterForQueueItemAvailable%2A> methods to register a subscriber for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> event.
trans-unit.target: Puede utilizar los métodos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.RegisterForQueueItemAvailable%2A> sobrecargados para registrar un suscriptor para el evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> event is used to notify subscribers that an item has been delivered (in an asynchronous manner) to this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: El evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable> se utiliza para notificar a los suscriptores que se ha entregado (de una manera asincrónica) un elemento a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.

trans-unit.source: A subscriber for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un suscriptor para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers a subscriber to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Registra un suscriptor en el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente código de ejemplo se muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> llamando al método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.RegisterForQueueItemAvailable%2A> to register the specified listener.
trans-unit.target: También utiliza <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.RegisterForQueueItemAvailable%2A> para registrar el agente de escucha especificado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de la muestra de SDK de actividad de observador de archivo del archivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [actividad del Monitor de sistema de archivos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="eventListener" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="eventListener" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A subscriber for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un suscriptor para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> of the activity that is subscribing to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" /> event or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> de la actividad que está suscribiendo al evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" /> o una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Registers a subscriber to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Registra un suscriptor en el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" />.

trans-unit.source: If the qualified name of the subscribing activity is supplied by `subscriberQualifiedName`, it is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.SubscribedActivityNames%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> associated with this queue when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called.
trans-unit.target: Si `subscriberQualifiedName` proporciona el nombre completo de la actividad de suscripción, se devuelve en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.SubscribedActivityNames%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> asociado a esta cola cuando se llama a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="eventListener" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="eventListener" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: A subscriber for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un suscriptor para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Unregisters a subscriber to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemArrived" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Anula un suscriptor en el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemArrived" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is reserved for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: Este método está reservado para uso interno solamente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="eventListener" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="eventListener" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A subscriber for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un suscriptor para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs" /> que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Unregisters a subscriber to the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Anula un suscriptor en el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.QueueItemAvailable" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente código de ejemplo se muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> llamando al método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.UnregisterForQueueItemAvailable%2A> to unregister the specified listener.
trans-unit.target: También utiliza <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue.UnregisterForQueueItemAvailable%2A> para anular el agente de escucha especificado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de la muestra de SDK de actividad de observador de archivo del archivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [actividad del Monitor de sistema de archivos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="eventListener" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="eventListener" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).
